app_description: Learn Spanish online or offline for free with SpanishDictionary.com the leading Spanish learning app trusted by millions. Translate anything between Spanish and English look up the conjugations for every Spanish verb and practice with our interactive quizzes lessons and drills. Watch thousands of pronunciation videos browse millions of example sentences and learn a new word each day with the Word of the Day. FEATURES: Learn Spanish: Learn Spanish from A to Z with hundreds of interactive video lessons covering introductory Spanish all the way through advanced grammar topics. Spanish English Dictionary: Browse thousands of entries that include translations examples regionalisms and context. Our English to Spanish and Spanish to English dictionary is lightning fast extremely accurate and works online or offline. Spanish English Translator: Type paste or dictate the English or Spanish text that you want to translate and receive translations from three state of the art AI powered and highly accurate neural machine translation engines. Then copy the results from our Spanish translator straight to your device. Spanish Verb Conjugations: Become a pro at Spanish conjugation. Conjugate any verb in any tense online or offline. Master irregular verbs and get context with example sentences. Spanish Pronunciation Videos: Perfect your Spanish pronunciation with native speaker videos for tens of thousands of words. Spanish Vocabulary Practice: Quiz yourself on thousands of Spanish words with our highly personalizable and extremely effective vocabulary system powered by spaced repetition. Spanish Grammar Guide: Our Spanish language experts have written thousands of articles and lessons about the most common Spanish grammar questions and the trickiest topics. Spanish Verb Conjugation Drills: Master the conjugations for any verb and any tense with interactive practice questions. Spanish Word of the Day: Never stop learning Spanish by discovering a new word each day. SpanishDictionary.com Premium: Take your learning to the next level with offline vocabulary quizzes no ads and downloadable Cheat Sheets and Phrasebooks. Check out some of our reviews: I m using this app to learn Spanish and build up my vocabulary and this is exactly what I need. I have been looking for places to teach me Spanish forever!! You can learn lessons for free just by watching 5 second ads after a lesson. If you ever need help with homework or a word this is the place. Easy to use and comprehensive. Large vocabulary and grammar examples abound It s all at your fingertips. So easy. So comprehensive I love the fact that it gives different word usages for Spain vs Latin American countries. Very helpful. And the grammar quizzes and words of the day are great. This has always been and will always be my favorite Spanish translator app If you choose to purchase SpanishDictionary.com Premium payment will be charged to your iTunes account and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period if offered will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication where applicable.
